criteria.name: Technical Accuracy
criteria.description: Factual correctness and technical precision of information presented

criteria.name: Clarity and Readability
criteria.description: How clearly and understandably the document communicates its message

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: Whether the document covers all necessary topics comprehensively

criteria.name: Organization and Structure
criteria.description: Logical flow, coherent structure, and effective use of headings/sections

criteria.name: Innovation and Insight
criteria.description: Novel ideas, creative solutions, and valuable insights presented

criteria.name: Evidence and Support
criteria.description: Quality of supporting evidence, examples, and references provided

criteria.name: Audience Appropriateness
criteria.description: How well the document is tailored to its intended audience

criteria.name: Visual Design and Formatting
criteria.description: Effective use of formatting, layout, and visual elements

criteria.name: Conciseness
criteria.description: Efficient use of language without unnecessary verbosity

criteria.name: Actionability
criteria.description: Whether the document provides clear, implementable recommendations

metadata.description: Comprehensive criteria for evaluating technical and business documents
